医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示抗糖尿病药物的潜在认知益处研究人员分析了超过 150 万 2 型糖尿病 (T2DM) 患者的记录中抗糖尿病药物的潜在认知影响，发现接受二甲双胍和葡萄糖钠共转运蛋白治疗的患者患痴呆症和阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 的风险显着降低。 2 抑制剂 (SGLT-2i) 与其他抗糖尿病药物相比。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Study-reveals-pottial-cognitive-benefits-of-antidiabetic-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Study-reveals-pottial-cognitive-benefits-of-antidiabetic-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b29a9a61-bd2b-41ea-aee5-ace21b6b8a37 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 13:05:02 -0400 Study reveals potential cognitive benefits of antidiabetic drugs
发现小脑在口渴调节中的新作用小脑通常被称为“小大脑”，由于其独特的结构和细胞的复杂性，作为进化史上最古老的大脑区域之一，几个世纪以来一直吸引着研究人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Discovering-the-cerebellums-new-role-in-thirst-modulation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Discovering-the-cerebellums-new-role-in-thirst-modulation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=188ebd07-63a5-453d-a444-5cb5bf9b073e Fri, 12 Jul 2024 12:58:09 -0400 Discovering the cerebellum's new role in thirst modulation
自恋从童年到老年逐渐减弱美国心理学会发表的一项研究表明，随着年龄的增长，从童年到成年，人们的自恋倾向会逐渐减弱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Narcissism-declines-from-childhood-through-old-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Narcissism-declines-from-childhood-through-old-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b4ec16fa-5a59-4500-9503-d6af7fcf1ae7 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 12:42:00 -0400 Narcissism declines from childhood through old age
昆士兰大学的研究提供了有关流感嗜血杆菌如何操纵免疫系统的见解昆士兰大学的研究人员发现了一种常见细菌如何在呼吸道感染期间操纵人类免疫系统并导致持续性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/UQ-study-offers-insights-into-how-Haemophilus-influenzae-manipulates-the-immune-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/UQ-study-offers-insights-into-how-Haemophilus-influenzae-manipulates-the-immune-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f7985481-537b-4ea6-b132-e8b398a201a9 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 11:48:35 -0400 UQ study offers insights into how Haemophilus influenzae manipulates the immune system
光学代谢成像揭示弓形虫感染如何改变宿主细胞代谢弓形虫是一种导致弓形虫病的寄生虫，弓形虫病是一种在约 30% 的人口中普遍存在的终生慢性感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Optical-metabolic-imaging-reveals-how-Toxoplasma-infection-changes-host-cell-metabolism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Optical-metabolic-imaging-reveals-how-Toxoplasma-infection-changes-host-cell-metabolism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97524fd9-c3f6-4b59-8de9-98ef1d8a7bbc Fri, 12 Jul 2024 11:24:31 -0400 Optical metabolic imaging reveals how Toxoplasma infection changes host cell metabolism
免疫细胞炎症可能是溶酶体贮积病中一些严重症状的原因病童医院 (SickKids) 的研究人员发现，免疫细胞中的炎症可能是导致溶酶体贮积病 (LSD) 的一组罕见遗传性疾病中某些严重症状的部分原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Immune-cell-inflammation-may-be-responsible-for-some-severe-symptoms-in-lysosomal-storage-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Immune-cell-inflammation-may-be-responsible-for-some-severe-symptoms-in-lysosomal-storage-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b05421d7-098d-451b-bdfa-c77f5d135072 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 09:42:15 -0400 Immune cell inflammation may be responsible for some severe symptoms in lysosomal storage diseases
加速您的研究：Dispen3D 利用 3D 模型的力量Dispen3D 正在为单细胞生物学设定新标准，使研究人员能够进行高精度实验，推动药物发现、个性化医疗和再生疗法的进步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Accelerate-Your-Research-Dispen3D-Harnesses-the-Power-of-3D-Models.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Accelerate-Your-Research-Dispen3D-Harnesses-the-Power-of-3D-Models.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e99383bb-c456-48c9-9c53-5ff82611775c Fri, 12 Jul 2024 09:33:00 -0400 Accelerate Your Research: Dispen3D Harnesses the Power of 3D Models
酶促 RNA 合成为可持续治疗铺平了道路虽然 COVID-19 疫苗让许多人接触到了基于 RNA 的药物，但 RNA 寡核苷酸已经上市多年，用于治疗杜氏肌营养不良症和淀粉样变性等疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Enzymatic-RNA-synthesis-paves-the-way-for-sustainable-therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Enzymatic-RNA-synthesis-paves-the-way-for-sustainable-therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b280340f-2d4d-4278-a5a6-94ca7ec85c6b Fri, 12 Jul 2024 09:11:16 -0400 Enzymatic RNA synthesis paves the way for sustainable therapeutics
各州规定了疗养院的最低人员配备水平。当规则被忽视或放弃时，居民就会遭受损失。在罗德岛州遗产山疗养院的几个小时里，约翰·佩尔诺里奥不断地按下床边的呼叫按钮。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/States-set-minimum-staffing-levels-for-nursing-homes-Residents-suffer-when-rules-are-ignored-or-waived.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/States-set-minimum-staffing-levels-for-nursing-homes-Residents-suffer-when-rules-are-ignored-or-waived.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3e04402c-92e6-4a63-9c19-68802f9867c3 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 08:32:57 -0400 States set minimum staffing levels for nursing homes. Residents suffer when rules are ignored or waived.
如何找到一个好的、人员齐全的疗养院很少有人愿意进入疗养院，但如果您或您所爱的人有身体或认知障碍或从手术中恢复，那么这样做可能是正确的选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/How-to-find-a-good-well-staffed-nursing-home.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/How-to-find-a-good-well-staffed-nursing-home.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e9404d6-3dd1-44d2-8a52-de7a2fd892ca Fri, 12 Jul 2024 08:28:07 -0400 How to find a good, well-staffed nursing home
